trophies.trophyName: Fakin' It All Night Long: Game Too Quickly
trophies.trophyDetail: Find the Faker as soon as possible in every round.

trophies.trophyName: Fakin' It All Night Long: Did You Learn Nothing
trophies.trophyDetail: Wrongfully accuse the same player of being the Faker twice in one round.

trophies.trophyName: Fakin' It All Night Long: Fiber
trophies.trophyDetail: Answer every prompt during Emoji-tional Damage with a poop emoji.

trophies.trophyName: Fakin' It All Night Long: Watch the Birdie
trophies.trophyDetail: Flip a feathered friend when asked to hold up fingers.

trophies.trophyName: Fakin' It All Night Long: Arachnid-Person
trophies.trophyDetail: Every player points at a unique player during a You Gotta Point prompt.

trophies.trophyName: Fakin' It All Night Long: I'm A Cool Mom
trophies.trophyDetail: Play an entire game with at least one player named Mom.

trophies.trophyName: Fakin' It All Night Long: Have You Considered Drawful?
trophies.trophyDetail: Fail to catch the Faker for an entire game.

trophies.trophyName: Dirty Drawful: Calm Down Picasso
trophies.trophyDetail: One player doesn't submit drawing before timer ends.

trophies.trophyName: Dirty Drawful: Olde Timey Artistes
trophies.trophyDetail: At least two players only use black and white for drawings.

trophies.trophyName: Dirty Drawful: Turned On
trophies.trophyDetail: Everyone only uses the fire emote for the entire game.

trophies.trophyName: Dirty Drawful: Everything Ok?
trophies.trophyDetail: One player uses the undo button 20 times.

trophies.trophyName: Dirty Drawful: Do You Work Here?
trophies.trophyDetail: Get every answer correct for a round.

trophies.trophyName: Dirty Drawful: I Like To Watch
trophies.trophyDetail: Complete a game with a single audience member for the entire game.

trophies.trophyName: Dirty Drawful: Have You Considered Fakin' It?
trophies.trophyDetail: Failed to guess the correct title for an entire game.

trophies.trophyName: Let Me Finish: Golden Tongue
trophies.trophyDetail: Win 100 percent of the vote during your matchup.

trophies.trophyName: Let Me Finish: Tsk Tsk Tsk
trophies.trophyDetail: Score zero points the whole game.

trophies.trophyName: Let Me Finish: Eager Beaver
trophies.trophyDetail: Debate every prompt.

trophies.trophyName: Let Me Finish: Close Shave
trophies.trophyDetail: Win the game by 100 points or less.

trophies.trophyName: Let Me Finish: Master Debater
trophies.trophyDetail: Win the game by 5,000 points or more.

trophies.trophyName: Let Me Finish: Group Chat
trophies.trophyDetail: Win 100 percent of the audience vote.
